title: Ranked REWARDS
body:
Hi im a gold 5 54 lp mid main, i recently got chat restricted because i started arguing with a guy and i got a bit to excited, i just heard rumours about people not getting their rewards when they have been restricted ONCE, is this true?:O
Ty for all comments and  Answers

replies.body: If you are currently chat restricted, spam bot matches until the restriction goes away and you will get the rewards. Hurry, You need to be Victorious!

According to [**this post**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230496748) if you have an *active chat restriction* when the season ends (in a few hours) the you will be *ineligible for rewards*. 

I hope that clears up the confusion, let me know if you have any other questions.
